title: Handwriting font from a lifeguard postcard
content:
Hi,  
this sample is from the back of a postcard advertising becoming a lifesaver (lifeguard) in Germany´s DLRG.  
Any Ideas on what the font is called ?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052931im_/http:/typophile.com/files/leo_karte_5455.png)

Font: 

 Scrawl 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052931/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: jrady
